summary:
This is a new HD retexture of molagbal\'s mace. I replaced every texture with NEW HD ones that closely resemble the original. No vanilla texture remain. I also did custom normal/bump maps, and specular maps. 2048/1024 pixel resolution available.
Upon request. I have also added custom glow maps for the eyes.
descriptionHtml:
Molagbal Mace HD Retextured

I\'ve re-textured everything on this mace at 2048pixel resolution, and 1024 pixel resolution. (For those who need it.) Every line you see has been redrawn from scratch. I\'ve used all new HD textures for this as well. I used ones that closely resembled the originals.. No vanilla textures remained. I also did custom normal/bump maps, and specular maps. 2048/1024 pixel resolution available. If you think something should be changed. Or you find any bugs. Let me know in the comments, as long as it\'s not unreasonable, I\'ll see what I can do.

I hope you like it. :)

Note:
Upon request. I have added a custom glow map for the eyes.
It\'s an optional file. You will still need the main 2048 or 1024 files in you want the retexture.
The file only contains the glowmap and updated .nif. Which means, If you decide you want only the glow, not the new textures. Then just install the molagbalmace-eyesv1 optional file.
Here\'s a comparison.
[img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/7825/comparek.jpg[/img]


**Installation**
This is compatible with the Mod Manager.
But manual installation is as follows.
. extract the .rar file to your skyrim\\data folder.

**For those with existing weapons packs**
This is also compatible with installed weapons packs. All you have to do is say yes to override,  and it will only replace this mace. All the others in the installed pack will remain.

______________________________________________________________________
Updates :
January 26th 2012 -- Added optional glowmaps for eyes.
______________________________________________________________________


I didn\'t make my own textures for this.
Credits go to the following, they allow use of their texture. Provided credit is given, of course.
The majority of the textures used are from http://mayang.com/textures/
With the exemption of the blade metal, and the skull teeth.
Blade -- wojtar-stock -- http://wojtar-stock.deviantart.com/gallery/?offset=72
Teeth -- DimondDoves-- http://dimonddoves.deviantart.com/art/Skull-bone-texture-59600191
author: DrownedSoul
